meanings.definition: The innermost parts or recesses of a place.
meanings.sent1: Exploring the penetralia of the cave revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The spider made its web in the penetralia of the old tree.
meanings.sent3: The cat's favorite hiding spot was the penetralia under the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts delved into the penetralia of her mind, seeking answers.
meanings.sent5: The detective searched the penetralia of the crime scene for clues.

meanings.definition: The most private or secret parts of a building or organization.
meanings.sent1: Only a select few were allowed access to the penetralia of the castle.
meanings.sent2: The CEO's office was located in the penetralia of the company headquarters.
meanings.sent3: The janitor accidentally stumbled upon the penetralia of the top-secret facility.
meanings.sent4: The spy infiltrated the penetralia of the enemy's base undetected.
meanings.sent5: The key to the safe was hidden in the penetralia of the room.
